channel.title: Summoning and Hunter Hover
channel.description:
I have 2 skills Summoning and Hunter.. Whenever you hover over them, It does nothing: [img]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w426/IMakeTheLedgeEnd/DoesThis.png[/img] What I want it to do: [img]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w426/IMakeTheLedgeEnd/WhatIwantittoDo.png[/img] With this interface thing popping up: [img]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w426/IMakeTheLedgeEnd/Skill256.png[/img]
If you don't understand what I mean by this, I can really explain it any better.. I'm wanting that interface to do that whenever you hover over "Summoning" or "Hunter" With the correct exp etc.
